explanation: In order to complete the task of putting two books on the desk, moving books to the desk, relocating two books to a bedroom desk, and dropping two books on the table, we will only need books from the environment. The other objects such as Bowl, CellPhone, Pencil, Pen, KeyChain, AlarmClock, Laptop, TennisRacket, TeddyBear, Pillow, CreditCard, CD are not relevant for this task.
